B_LOGIN_INVALID_FIELD.log: Login POST submission does not contain a username and/or a password

B_LOGIN_MISSING_FIELD.log: Login submission has been refused because some fields are not filled

B_LOGIN_USER_NOT_FOUND.log: Login submission has been refused because the provided username or email is not registered

B_LOGIN_INVALID_PASSWORD.log: Login submission has been refused because the password does not match the provided user

B_REGISTER_INVALID_FIELD.log: Register POST submission does not contain a mandatory field in username, email, code, pass1 and pass2

B_REGISTER_MISSING_FIELD.log: Register submission has been refused because some fields are not filled

B_REGISTER_DIFFERENT_PASSWORDS.log: Register submission has been refused because the two passwords do not match

B_REGISTER_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT.log: Register submission has been refused because the password must have a minimal length of

B_REGISTER_INVALID_CODE.log: The provided invitation code is invalid or expired

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_INVALID_FIELD.log: Change password POST submission does not contain a mandatory field in pass1, pass2 and pass3

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_EMPTY_FIELD.log: No password modification were sent, all fields are empty

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_INVALID_PASSWO.log: Update password submission has been refused because the password does not match the provided user

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_PASS.log: The two provided passwords are not matching

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_SAME_PASSWORDS.log: Submitted password is the same as current password

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_PASSWORD_TOO_S.log: Update password submission has been refused because the password must have a minimal length of

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_INVALID_FIELD.log: Update role POST submission does not contain a mandatory field in userId, roleId or checked

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_CANT_REMOVE_ADMIN_.log: Can't revoke admin role from root user

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_INFO_INVALID_FIELD.log: Data sent to the server does not contain a mandatory field in username and email

B_PROFILE_UPDATE_INFO_NO_CHANGES.log: No changes provided to user information

B_USER_NOT_FOUND.log: Can not find user in database

B_ROLE_NOT_FOUND.log: Can not find role in database

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_FIND.log: Database error when trying to find user in Users collection

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_SAVE.log: Database error when trying to save user in Users collection

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_COUNT.log: Database error when trying to count users in Users collection

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_DELETE.log: Database error when trying to delete user in Users collection

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_ROLE_FIND.log: Database error when trying to find role in Roles collection

B_INTERNAL_ERROR_ROLE_SAVE.log: Database error when trying to save role in Roles collection
